SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! Action name : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RetrieveMavenArtifactAction"
! Attaching Resource : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INLCUDE.PREPARE_CMD@WIN
!Repository : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_REPOSITORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -repository &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!Group : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_GROUP_ID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -groupID &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!Version : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_VERSION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -baseversion &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_ARTIFACT_ID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -artifactid &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!Extension :IF &UC4RB_NXS_EXTENSION# <>"" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_EXTENSION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -extension &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") :ENDIF
!Classifier :IF &UC4RB_NXS_CLASSIFIER# <>"" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_CLASSIFIER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -classifier &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") :ENDIF
!target folder :IF &UC4RB_NXS_TARGET# = "" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_TARGET# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_TARGET# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -target &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!File Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_TARGET_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -filename &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_NXS_CMD#
! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_NXS_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ Status messages --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RETRIEVE MAVEN ARTIFACT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RETRIEVE MAVEN ARTIFACT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
